ggsegKleist

This package contains the Kleist 1934 historical atlas of functional segregation for plotting with ggseg and ggseg3d, based on the supplementary materials of Pijnenburg et al., NeuroImage, 239, 2021 DOI; Version 1; 15-01-2021.

Kleist K. (1934) Gehirnpathologie vornehmlich auf Grund der Kriegserfahrungen (Leipzig: Barth).

To learn how to use these atlases, please look at the documentation for ggseg and ggseg3d.

Installation

You can install ggsegKleist from GitHub with:

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("ggsegverse/ggsegKleist")

2D plotting 

library(ggsegKleist)
library(ggseg)
library(ggplot2)

ggplot() +
  geom_brain(
    atlas = kleist(),
    mapping = aes(fill = label),
    position = position_brain(hemi ~ view),
    show.legend = FALSE
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = kleist()$palette, na.value = "grey") +
  theme_void()

3D plotting 

library(ggseg3d)

ggseg3d(atlas = kleist()) |>
  add_glassbrain() |>
  pan_camera("right lateral")

Please note that the ‘ggsegKleist’ project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
